Comment.Language: For the Feast of the Wedding at Cana of Galilee:

Text.Language: O who at the Wedding at Cana of Galilee / Turned water into select wine / Turn our hearts, O Immanuel / From evil to what pleases You, O Holy One.
يا من في عرس قانا الجليل: حولت الماء خمراً جميل: حول قلوبنا يا عمانوئيل: من الشر إلى ما يرضيك ياقدوس.
All/louia (4) I/couc Pi,~rictoc Ps/ri m~V]: afc~mou e~nimwou afaitou n~/rp.
Alleluia (4). Jesus Christ, the Son of God, blessed the waters, and made them wine.
الليلويا (4) يسوع المسيح ابن الله بارك المياه فصيرها خمرا.
